description:
This course, 3 Questions - Finding Answers to Personal Success, teaches a decision making tool that will help students to determine what success looks like and help them to identify what it will take to achieve their success. Â The tool and supplemental information can be covered in about an hour, and students can start using the tool immediately to make decisions in their lives.

If you have ever tried to achieve something only to fail because you underestimated what it would take, or if you are interested in learning a new approach to making decisions and achieving success, then this course is for you!
title: 3 Questions - Finding Answers to Personal Success
